content: The bonus tip — Always hit Cmd + S every 5 mins. I’ve been burned before having lost my progress especially when I have 3–4 large Sketch files are open making Sketch unresponsive. Or sometimes my MacBook runs out of RAM required to keep all of the Sketch files open (when will we have MacBooks with 32GB RAM, Apple?) and I have to force quit Sketch ending up losing my unsaved progress.
